'''''Amon Hen'' 41''' is the forty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in October [[1979]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Lucy Matthews
* Contents
* Editorial
** By: Jeremy Morgan
* Gondorfeast
** By: [[Jonathan Simons]]
* On Publicising the Tolkien Society
** By: Jessica Yates
* Tolkien Societies in Sweden
** By: Gabriel Stein
* Tinco-tailor 
** By: [[Susan Rule]]
* The Orcish Kingdoms of the Fourth Age
** By: Alex Woolf
* The Last Living Memory
** By: [[Richard Sturch]]
* Religion in Middle-earth
** By: Ted Crawford
* Review: ''The Chronicles of Thomas the Unbeliever''
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Tolk Folk
* Report: [[Oxonmoot 1979]]
** By: Jessica Yates
* Letters
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* Publications Received
** By: Fiona and Jeremy Morgan
* Books of Interest and Press Cuttings
** By: Fiona and Jeremy Morgan
* Back Page
